website_summaries.verdict: Many younger children enjoy the idea of scented markers, and the ink is water-based and non-toxic.
pros: Durable beveled tip holds up under heavy use
Contains twice as much ink as other brands
Each color has a unique scent
Pen barrel is large, easier for younger children to control
cons: Reports of missing or damaged markers and poor packaging

customer_reviews.title: A smash hit outta the ball park!
customer_reviews.text: What's smelly, colorful and has twice as much ink as other markers? Mr. Sketch! Yes! These markers are the bomb! You can use these markers to do some artwork or color over a message or symbol with a white color pencil to reveal what it is. The smells include: Magenta = raspberry Pink = watermelon Red = cherry Orange = orange Yellow = banana Green = mint Dark green = apple Blue/turquoise = fruit punch Light blue = blue raspberry Navy blue = blueberry Lavender = sweet plum Purple = grape Brown = cinnamon roll Black = licorice Yes! Get your hands on these if you can and pick these up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca (Champ) Fair

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love Mr Sketch! As a teacher, I use these all the time for charts and signs and often buy them as gifts for colleagues. The scents in this pack are all great, although the black licorice isn't my favorite. The colors are bold and bright. The pinks do fade pretty quickly, but the others hold up well. The ink does bleed through to the back of the paper, but it won't mark up the next paper underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M.

customer_reviews.title: Just like I remember
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to give to my 2nd grader each day as she completes her distance learning! Since we are homebound for quite some time - I thought a little reward at the end of the school day would be nice. Worked like a charm. She's so excited to pick a color each afternoon. The markers smell like the candy version of the scents - just as expected!! The colors are bright and bold - my 7 year old was delighted!
customer_reviews.author: rach

customer_reviews.title: Confusing smells
customer_reviews.text: These markers write well. The scents are nice, not overpowering. My only issue is that a couple of them I could not figure out what the scent was. I would smell, then have to look at the label to see what it was supposed to be, and do a double take. I like to think my nose works pretty well but these had me doubting my nasal ability. Some just do not smell like the description. But they smell good. The kids love them. If they are happy, I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: ASConner

customer_reviews.title: Fun times for all
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to share with my intervention students and they had the best time smelling each and every one. The chimney marker had mixed reactions...some kids thought that it was straight up ‘nasty’ while others thought that it smelled like medicine. I personally found it smelled like someone had burned SOS scrubbing pads. Definitely worth ordering the set and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bookgirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome markers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my coloring addicted 5 year old. I was super excited to see a holiday edition scented marker. Mr sketch always provides the best quality of long lasting markers. All of the scents were pleasant except for chimney, that kind of smelled like gas to me. My daughter has been using them nonstop. We are very pleased. Missing from my photo is the sugar plum scented marker, my 5 year old said she lost it. Typical kids! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harris

customer_reviews.title: and we have given these markers as gifts (with a sketch pad) to boys and girls between the ages of 3 and 7 and they have all lov
customer_reviews.text: Our kids have these, and we have given these markers as gifts (with a sketch pad) to boys and girls between the ages of 3 and 7 and they have all loved them too. The scents are fantastic, and they are washable, which all parents appreciate. And,if you were alive during the 70s and 80s like we were, the scents are a wonderful walk down memory lane. So glad these are back!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any child! Each marker has a great smell!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law suggested that I buy these for my 3 year old grandson for his birthday. She assured me he would love them. Well, she was right! I had also purchased all kinds of expensive toys and clothes - he didn't even look at those. I was sure he would love all the Star Wars items but when he saw these markers....all else was forgotten! He colored with them for hours. He is already asking MeMe to buy him some more next year! They are a great purchase for any child who likes to draw and color. The smell of each color is a nice educational touch!
customer_reviews.author: sharon smith

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love Mr. Sketch and especially this set. All of the scents smell really good (except Chimney, it smells odd, but we all have different liking's). The markers write and draw good, but if you are new to the chisel tip kinds, it can be hard to find an angle to write/draw with. However, they smell WONDERFUL. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: These have lasted me for a year of school chart-making. I don't like the yellow (color or smell). I like the boldness and that they don't bleed through. I don't know why I have to buy them myself when the district should provide chart markers since our curriculum calls for them. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter adores these! I saw them at Walmart but the price was a little steep- my friend posted a link to these the next day! We use them for daughter’s pandemic journal for school. They are the real deal and they shipped very quickly! All in all, great experience and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Willocks

customer_reviews.title: Delicious smells!
customer_reviews.text: Just as I remembered from my own school age years! I bought these for my 2 year old with sensory processing disorder as the yummy smells help keep him focused when drawing and coloring. The scents are all so good but the sniffing does lead to some colorful noses haha!
customer_reviews.author: JAD

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THESE
customer_reviews.text: These markers are the EXACT same as 40 years ago! Of course,they didn't come in washable then so I guess they're even better.The scents are spot-on the same and literally trigger memories of when I would sniff them in class.I remember I even took a blue one home so I could smell it all the time (oops).Since not many products are unchanged from that long ago,these are truly OG!
customer_reviews.author: AkLace

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift. When the package arrived the markers were out of the box and loose in the envelope that they were mailed in. In addition to this, there are only 5 markers in the envelope when there are supposed to be 6 according to the box. I am very unsatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my granddaughter at Christmas. Many of the markers were broken. Only option was to send back for a replacement. Not convenient because she lives an hour away. The product, when it is in one piece, is great. My own daughter loved these when she was little over 20 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: 90’s kid nostalgia!!!
customer_reviews.text: I remember these markers from childhood and they smell just as good. They wash off well and are sturdy enough for my 3 year old to use. The price is slightly higher than the ones in the store but I’m sure amazon charges fees and shipping isn’t free so I get it. The markers all smell like they are suppose to. So amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: _Phaedra_

customer_reviews.title: basically I am an adult toddler. I love the fruity smell
customer_reviews.text: basically I am an adult toddler. I love the fruity smell of these markers! And you would be surprised at how many adults in the office can resist sniffing them as they use them in presentations. It's kind of funny to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Scent is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if these are just old or if they have just down in quality since I was a kid but they barely smell. I remember these markers being very potent and that was not the case with these. There was barely a scent to them..
customer_reviews.author: Jessica5144

customer_reviews.title: Relive your childhood or enhance some kid’s childhood now!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend and I LOVED the Mr. Sketch markers when we were kids. So, when Christmas rolled around and it came time to fill a shoebox with goodies for a kiddo, I knew what had to go in there. Same great quality, same fun smells! Highly recommend for kids and kids at heart.
customer_reviews.author: YouneedabiscuitTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged and in poor condition.
customer_reviews.text: Markers arrived in a packaged that was clearly damaged and cut through. Possibly used. Very disappointed in the condition in which these arrived as they were meant to be part of a Christmas gift. My kids love these, but I will not purchase through Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Spinclassdoctor

customer_reviews.title: Markers are great, box was not
customer_reviews.text: I only rate this product an overall of 3 stars because the product arrived in a destroyed box. I was gifting these to a student at the end of the school year and had to buy a gift bag to put them in, instead of giving him the box with the markers in it. The box has the code for the different scents, so it is kind of important that the box be intact upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Swan

customer_reviews.title: Good for coloring but not scented
customer_reviews.text: The sketch scented markers are usually my favorite because of the sense that they have, however the pack arrived and the scent was not there. The markers do work for the sake of coloring but they are unscented.
customer_reviews.author: K. TEJEDA

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for facilitation!
customer_reviews.text: I love these darn markers. They are all I use for writing on big flip charts when I'm facilitating large groups. They're tough to find locally, so I was glad to find them here!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for some who cant smell....
customer_reviews.text: We used these to test my son's smelling power.. he kept saying he couldn't smell anything and I immediately thought of these markers .. back in school when someone opened them you could smell them from across the room.... well they didnt work on my son... so we had to go a more expensive route of doing an MRI to find out he has no olfactory bulbs so he really cant smell.. oh well mommy has smelly markers now for her coloring book...
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: How do they make them smell like that?!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how much these smell like real food... tou can actually smell jalapeños in the nacho scent! The colors are vibrant and they write smooth. I use smelly markers daily in my classroom and these ones are a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Mims

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when buying these. Mine expired 01/20/2020 but Amazon made it right so I can't complain. Some of the markers have their scent still but most did not. I bought them for my daughter, so I'm disposing of them. I don't want her using them because of their expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: kmuffin88

customer_reviews.title: Fun Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are fun. My students enjoy using them. I’m not a fan Of the black one because it’s supposed to be a fireplace smell but it smells bad. Overall a fun purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for quantity
customer_reviews.text: Cool that these are 14 and not a 10 pack, didn't even know these existed. Happy with the price for the quantitee but the package was badly damaged but I think that's to be expected with a warehouse purchase so I'm not deducting stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: Lovestocook

customer_reviews.title: ... up on these markers and boy did we all love them. I remember running around with the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I grew up on these markers and boy did we all love them. I remember running around with the other kids in the classroom smelling them and trading markers. These markers do a great job, much better than crayons. The color is real pretty and the color flow is great. Must have for anyone that wants markers!
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: The smells ~ colors ~
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love these! Can’t keep them in long enough. With 7 grandchildren they all love the art & crafts. They just can’t seem to get enough time playing with this stuff 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Burghart

customer_reviews.title: They dried out in less than 6 months!
customer_reviews.text: My kids used Mr. Sketch markers 25 years ago and the few I have left are still going strong. I ordered the seemingly same markers less that 6 months ago for my grandkids and they are already dried out!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Missing marker!
customer_reviews.text: Love these markers but highly disappointed that my favorite one is missing!!! I checked the box to double check that it didn’t fall out but nothing was there. I’ve never had a bad review on amazon until now.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Rich

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mr. Sketch colors and scents in a washable version
customer_reviews.text: So glad to find Mr. Sketch markers in a washable form ! The grandkids love the scents and I like that they clean up pretty darn well. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Lover

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. My daughter love them, because of the nice smell and now she close all markers to keep them. Other kind of markers she forgot to close.
customer_reviews.author: Seli

customer_reviews.title: The worst gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a co-worker for Christmas. I didn't think to open the manufacturing package and inspect each marker before wrapping the gift. I wish I had! Every one of the markers were broken! Absolutely terrible. I spent $10 on these and they are broken. Not to mention that this person's gift was ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love these markers and so does my 5 year old! He loves using these, and not only are they fun but they are also sturdy. He doesnt ruin tips and hes always careful to put the cap on these. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Callen

customer_reviews.title: I love these smell good markers
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my training classes and my adult students really enjoy using them to create flip charts in class.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They smell great and my kids love them. Buying them here makes them a much better value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Teacher favorite right here!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these markers LOVE them. They smell like my childhood, instead of coloring pictures I create anchor charts for my students. They do bleed through so don't expect to write/draw on both sides. My students also love when I check their work with these markers. They love the smell of the markers and brightens their day.
customer_reviews.author: Momof217

customer_reviews.title: Adults Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I have to replace these markers all the time because my executive-level clients love them and ask if they can keep them! Great icebreaker for flip chart exercises. Always a hit.
customer_reviews.author: travelmuse

customer_reviews.title: Fun markers, smell great!
customer_reviews.text: My youngest son is OBSESSED with these markers. He talked about them every day for the first half of kindergarten. I had to smell every art project he brought home so I bought him his own pack to have at home. He loves them, uses them very often.
customer_reviews.author: J Vickery

customer_reviews.title: The best washable markers!!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 7 year-old daughter LOVES these markers. They smell amazing and the colors are super vibrant. She literally uses them daily! Since they are washable, they clean up well!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca F.

customer_reviews.title: There can only be one...marker for teachers.
customer_reviews.text: Teachers are picky and when we like a product, we stick to it. Mr Sketch has been a staple of teaching since I was a kid (thats a long time ago) and work great. They work and smell great. I love these! If you really like your kids' teachers, buy them these if markers are on their wishlist.
customer_reviews.author: S. Namboun Terracina

customer_reviews.title: What Happened?!
customer_reviews.text: TBH, these stink. I’m not sure if my scent expectations were a lot lower as a kid or if they legitimately smell worse now but these are mostly unpleasant. Watermelon smells like vomit. They color well though so that’s good...
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my 3yo, they really are washable and they smell really good but after a couple weeks of use the point got inside of the marker making it impossible to use
customer_reviews.author: Romina O. Leon

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: While writing my pen pal letters, I Notice they were lacking color so I decided to get these markers for reminding me of my childhood and I want to shout out with my penpal!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Who Doesn’t Love the Smell of Christmas?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to put in my son’s stocking. Every year we purchase a large set of markers from Mr. Sketch for them to take to school, so I am excited for them to experience the Christmas variety!
customer_reviews.author: CPSanti

customer_reviews.title: I loved these growing up
customer_reviews.text: I loved these growing up! I have some old ones and my kinder students love them so I decided to get some new ones! They arrived fine, all the markers are fresh and new but about half of them don’t smell at all. Idk if I got a stepped on batch or what but I was bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Kaye Dynoske

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously the best markers . Forget the crayola washable markers . These are washable , yet so bright !!!! Extremely bright
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: They don’t smell very much
customer_reviews.text: These do not smell very strong like the other scented markers we have. Thought they would be a fun stocking stuffer but not really since they barely smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sonoma Momma

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit with my 2 year old! She received these for Christmas and still uses these daily to draw 2 months later. Some colors are beginning to dry out but she’s been known to leave these markers with caps off for some time. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sashunia

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good markers for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good markers for the price. The scent is a little weird on some of them, but they do all have a unique scent. The colors are pretty vibrant and stay that way for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these markers. I had to order a set for myself because they take me back to childhood I usually have to steal them back from my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The smells of these were a little intense compared to the normal markers.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Mills

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant Colors
customer_reviews.text: Daughter requested these markers and I would have a better review if they had been taken to school and returned home but since they were left in the classroom and I never threw one away I'd guess that is a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love the new colors!
customer_reviews.text: These markers have been my favorite since I was a kid, and I use them all of the time in my classroom! I was so excited to see that they now have more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Cute Markers- fun!
customer_reviews.text: Cute fun markers. My kids love scented markers! Great brand that hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: MaineMom

customer_reviews.title: Smelled great, but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if we got a bad pack, but after the third use. The marker tips were loose and would easily go inside the marker
customer_reviews.author: Haas's

customer_reviews.title: Great markers
customer_reviews.text: These markers bring me back to childhood. The scents are so fun and they write so well. My kids love drawing with them as well as trying to guess which scent they have.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Owens

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scented Markers
customer_reviews.text: Easy to color with. Full, rich color. Easy to use. Smell delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Chantilly Lace

customer_reviews.title: I love that this pack has more than just the "traditional" ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this pack has more than just the "traditional" colors and scents. As a teacher, I love to make my posters bright and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: We love Mr. Sketch markers
customer_reviews.text: We love Mr. Sketch markers. The chimney scent in this pack smells terrible but is a lot of fun to make other people smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Red D

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how I remembered them from elementary school
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a friend to reminisce over the markers we had used in elementary school. They're just as how we remembered them!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Markers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these markers! They are very bright. My students love how they smell!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors look great. I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love to these as a gift. The scent is strong, but not overwhelming. The colors are vibrant. He has had a great time with them I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: ShellDT

customer_reviews.title: Broken markers
customer_reviews.text: Infortunally when I used and opens the box , the most of them was broken !!!
customer_reviews.author: paula jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great markers
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Sketch adds fun to projects and working with kiddos. These are great
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: ♥️♥️♥️♥️
customer_reviews.text: My 5th graders love their papers to be graded with these smelly markers!
customer_reviews.author: jukesbox

customer_reviews.title: Bright, fun markers
customer_reviews.text: These markers are so much brighter and seem to have much more pigment than other brands. Oh, and they smell great too. And wash off easily when your child inevitably touches one to their nose.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Smell great and last forever!
customer_reviews.text: I use these markers to make anchor charts in my classroom and they work well! They have a ton of ink in them and smell good to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Westfall

customer_reviews.title: which is not cool.
customer_reviews.text: These markers are most definitely NOT washable! The kids were coloring at their table, some marks were made on the table, and they do NOT come off! I typically do not let my kids use un-washable art materials (for obvious reasons - kids are messy), so this was important for me. Now our table has permanent markings, which is not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Markers heads odd
customer_reviews.text: Smell great. I don't know if perhaps my children are drawing too hard with these but all of the tips look like they retracted into the marker and they are no longer useable. We bought these 3 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: diamondintheruff2786

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a remember having as a kid with new scents and are washable! My son got a few marks in the floor and table and I was able to wipe them off. I got to it fairly quickly so I can't attest to how easily it washes off after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Beaman

customer_reviews.title: Same as before
customer_reviews.text: I love my smelly markers . Just like when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Brittdrew

customer_reviews.title: Fav smelly markers
customer_reviews.text: We love these smelly markers because they last the longest out of all the other crayola versions. Seem to have the most ink.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H.

customer_reviews.title: bold colors, putrid smell
customer_reviews.text: The colors are nice and bold but the smell in two of them is putrid. We had to step away and air our drawings out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a 4 year old boy, and he loves them. I must say, I love them too! Brings back great memories. They work great and the smells are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: Cute markers for my niece
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my niece who requested scented markers or smarkers. These arrived exactly as shown on the box. When she opened it up I got the chance to smell some of them and they would be what you expect - purple smells like grape, etc. They look like highlighters and are bulky markers. I really like that they are washable.
customer_reviews.author: KKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Just like I recall from when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and smelly. I still love the orange smell. Kids enjoy. The only downside is that the kids tend to get colors on their noses from smelling them! Haha!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi NJ

customer_reviews.title: Smell good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. We’ve made different charts for him with them. He loves the smell
customer_reviews.author: Carol Toomey

customer_reviews.title: I love how they haven't even changed them since I was ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how they haven't even changed them since I was a kid, just added new flavors. Now my son gets to experience it all just like I did. Smell great and also write flawlessly. Love these!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Envy

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my classroom and I love these! Great colors and they all show up well on paper. Plus, they smell so good! It’s a win win
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: You need these
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Just wish they hadn’t replaced lemon with banana.
customer_reviews.author: KRIS

customer_reviews.title: New Favorites
customer_reviews.text: These markers are perfect for working with children of all ages! Actually, I am over 50 and I love them, too! Adds fun and excitement to art projects and our coloring time together!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: You will likely see dots on your kids noses from smelling while they color.  Very fun
customer_reviews.text: These are great for kids. Bright vibrant colors and large wide tips that make it fun to color larger coloring books. We haven't had issues with stains on clothing or tables through the paper.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Smell so good you almost want to taste them!
customer_reviews.text: My mother had me order these for my niece, man did it bring back some memories! I don't remember them being washable though so that is a nice improvement! I purchased this item for full price.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Morrill

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the product...
customer_reviews.text: Markers were dried out and seemed to have little to no scent(which is the draw). I have been pleased by these in the past. Very unfortunate, hopefully a one time issue.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rodelius

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these!! Use them on anchor charts for teaching and can’t get enough.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lorainne Anskis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scented markers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for a marker loving 2 year old girl and she had never experienced scented markers before. She and her brother were totally blown away by them! These were my favorites as a kid but back in the 80's they weren't washable, so they're even better now! Fun stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kate MahoneyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: It’s not washable
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with product I bought them because it said they were washable and unfortunately they are not. My 23 month daughter got them started writing on a table I got from here. Now unable to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Chenda

customer_reviews.title: Great fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: We used these as Bingo dabbers for Bingo during our family reunion, The kids thought that they smelled good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, fun holiday scents
customer_reviews.text: I was missing the red one so I was credited for my purchase however that is one that probably smelled the best.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher3

customer_reviews.title: These are fun vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: These are fun vibrant colors! My kids (3&4) didn't mind the smells at all. In some ways the markers are a little advanced for them in respect to the tip that allows a thin and thicker line vs. a regular round tip marker, but they don't seem to notice. Washable is a plus. They had marker all over their hands and we needed to go out, a little soap and water without too much effort and it came right off! Loved these so far and would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: Dried out and not working.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughters birthday. When she opened them yesterday the black (licorice) did not work. I’m very disappointed and because I waited to give them to her and didn’t think to check them , it’s too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Janovsky

customer_reviews.title: Fun makers
customer_reviews.text: I love that these markets are washable and my kids love that they have fun scents that bring out the creative side. The ends of the marker are slanted so it is easy to draw with and it keeps my kids busy for hours. This review is my own 100% unbiased opinion. #Sponsored
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Markers
customer_reviews.text: Markers smelled good and wrote well - the package was a bit annoying but my kid never keeps anything in the package
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good price for awesome markers.
customer_reviews.text: Used these for stocking stuffers and the kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: What's that smell? I smell Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: These sented markers are awesome and smelly! I didn't really like the marketing they did with these product but my 4 year old did. Fruits tootn into the markers for the scent was a little much. Especially when my daughter pretends to toot into them as well! She loves these things though!
customer_reviews.author: Break

customer_reviews.title: nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: I had these as a child and got them for my children. Same smells and colors, works well, kids loved them.

customer_reviews.text: Not good for 5 years old hard to drawing because of the shape of head

product_meta.title: Mr. Sketch 1924061 Washable Scented Markers, Chisel Tip, Assorted Colors, 14-Count
product_meta.description: Color:Assorted Colors| Size:14-Count| Style:CHISELBright markers with fun scents to feed your imagination. Colors are bright and vivid, but wash easily from hands and most clothing. Mr. Sketch markers have twice the ink of most markers to last super-long. The smooth-flowing bevel-tip makes sketching easier and draws in fine, medium or wide lines. The tip is sturdy to keep its shape even after months of coloring. The specially formulated, non-bleeding water-based ink is great for easels. It's safe for children and certified AP non-toxic. Each color has its own fun scent that stays even after the ink dries so your keeps smelling as good as it looks. Includes markers in all core colors (Magenta, Pink, Red, Orange, Yellow, Light Green, Dark Green, Turquoise, Light Blue, Blue, Light Purple, Purple, Brown, and Black). Collect all the great Mr. Sketch colors and scents. Core color assortment includes magenta (raspberry), pink (watermelon), red (cherry), orange (orange), yellow (banana), light green (mint), dark green (apple), turquoise (fruit punch), light blue (blue raspberry), blue (blueberry), light purple (sweet plum), purple (grape), brown (cinnamon), and black (licorice). Movie Night Colors include Yellow/Hot Buttery Popcorn, Pink/Watermelon Hard Candy, Light Blue/Blue Raspberry Slushie, Orange/Nacho Cheese, Dark Brown/Mint Chocolate Candy, and Light Brown/Root Beer. Holiday colors include Includes Red (Candy Cane), Beige (Santa's Cookie), Dark Green (Christmas Tree), Purple (Sugar Plum), Brown (Gingerbread), and Grey (Chimney). Ice Cream Colors includes light pink (bubble gum), yellow (lemon ice), light green (mint chocolate chip), pink (strawberry), brown (chocolate), and blue (stinky cheese).
feature_bullets: Colors are bright and vivid, but wash easily from hands and most clothing. Mr. Sketch markers have twice the ink of most markers to last super long
The smooth flowing bevel tip makes sketching easier and draws in fine, medium or wide lines. The tip is sturdy to keep its shape even after months of coloring
The specially formulated, non bleeding water based ink is great for easels. It's safe for children and certified AP non toxic
Each color has its own fun scent that stays even after the ink dries so your keeps smelling as good as it looks. See product description for all color/scent combinations
Includes markers in all core colors (Magenta, Pink, Red, Orange, Yellow, Light Green, Dark Green, Turquoise, Light Blue, Blue, Light Purple, Purple, Brown, and Black)
